title: Michael Phelps. 8 medals. One Historic Photograph.

comments.author: k!Dbuu
comments.content: Phelps is a Freak , Bolt will join him soon on that Freaks Hall Of Freakiness :D. Anyways am a fan of Phelps. Bindra Gold wasnt much of an achievement , Just too much Banda, and soon he'll be another Rathore >:) . Hope Vijender Kumar does it for India, Even if he doesnt end up with a medal He totally deserves some Recognition and Praise & Should put F\*ing Bindra in the Shadows.

comments.content: The day Indians use some sort of inspiration or some "Veriyoda" from Olympians and land in any Olympics top 20 medals table i guess would be when 1)Human Cloning is perfected or 2) too many world wars would have happened out and less than 20 countries are left on earth XD

comments.author: Pradep

Not only THE best in swimming , but THE BEST OLYMPIAN OF ALL TIME .... That fame will never fade in his lifetime .. For Sure ..

comments.author: srivatsan
comments.content: The main problem with you people is that you always underestimate other indians..and according to you,US is biig country. US got its freedom in 1776 India got freedom in 1947 so the gap is 171 years... so by now,india should be like how US was in 1837...but we are now like US,as it was in 2006 or atleast our gap is just 2-3 years...so is this not speed?is this not development? To say,India is poor country with lots of riches and so is all the capitalist countries in the world... Will you allow your child or brother or sister or friend to discontinue his studies and do full fledged sports practise? No.You will say those who fail in exams as not fit for anything and tell him to get job as soon as possible,but you would blame india for not getting gold medals.. you will not finance sports people but will blame india for not funding? I want to ask something...Who makes India? It is none other than you and me...we as a whole is india..but we try to escape by putting blame on politicians and go on earning money... if you have urge to earn money and not to help others(not family or friends),so is politician who is also human being...if you try to act socially..i mean clean your street,remove stones from road,..these may look like small acts but will save lives ... but you simple blame politician..so the mistake is with us not with government... :( And 'YOU' refers not to you friends but to those who always blame and degrade india and indians sorry pradep,but i cant control my emotions reading comments on this page :(

comments.author: Pradep
comments.content: @Srivatsan Konjam Moochu vidu da .. Shabaaa , tension aagatha .. Nee oru Two Wheeler otratha vechippom, Oru bus a follow pannitte atha over take panna try panratha vechippom . Ethaavathu oru kattathula overtake pannanumla ? Kaaalathukkum pinnadiye poittiruntha velaikku aagathunnnu solla varen . Nee Solrathellam noothukku nooru unmai da .. And abt the discontinuing studies thing , angellam entha naayum college llam padikkarthilla da .. School oda erakattidraannga . Athaan intha maari aalungallam sports e gadhinnu vanthudraanga . So makkale Olympic la neraya thangam venuma ?? Mavane ella college a yum izhuthu moodunga :-P .
